control_ids.title: Control IDs
control_ids.description: The IDs of the controls that will be created by the factory.

variables.title: Variable Definition
variables.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

control.title: Element
control.description: An element is a control that can be added to a screen. It can be a button, a label, an image, etc.

allow_scroll_even_when_content_fits.title: Allow Scroll Even When Content Fits
allow_scroll_even_when_content_fits.description: If true, the element will allow scrolling even when the content fits.

always_handle_scrolling.title: Always Handle Scrolling
always_handle_scrolling.description: If true, the element will always handle scrolling.

always_rotate.title: Always Rotate
always_rotate.description: If true, the element will always rotate.

always_listen_to_input.title: Always Listen To Input
always_listen_to_input.description: If true, the element will always listen to input.

always_handle_pointer.title: Always Handle Pointer
always_handle_pointer.description: If true, the element will always handle the pointer.

anims.title: Animations
anims.description: The animations that are contained within this element.

anchor_from.title: Anchor From
anchor_from.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

anchor_to.title: Anchor To
anchor_to.description: The anchor point of the element. This is the point that the element will be positioned relative to.

bindings.title: Bindings
bindings.description: The bindings that are contained within this element.

binding_collection_name.title: Binding Collection Name
binding_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_collection_prefix.title: Binding Collection Prefix
binding_collection_prefix.description: The prefix of the collection that the binding is in.

binding_condition.title: Binding Condition
binding_condition.description: The condition that must be met for the binding to be applied.

binding_name.title: Binding Name
binding_name.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

binding_name_override.title: Binding Name Override
binding_name_override.description: The name of the binding. This is used to reference the binding in the element's properties.

ignored.title: Ignored
ignored.description: If true, the binding will be ignored.

resolve_sibling_scope.title: Resolve Sibling Scope
resolve_sibling_scope.description: If true, the binding will resolve sibling scope.

source_control_name.title: Source Control Name
source_control_name.description: The name of the control that the binding is in.

source_property_name.title: Source Property Name
source_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

target_property_name.title: Target Property Name
target_property_name.description: The name of the property that the binding is in.

bilinear.title: Bilinear
bilinear.description: If true, the element will use bilinear filtering.

background_control.title: Background Control
background_control.description: The control that will be used for the background.

background_hover_control.title: Background Hover Control
background_hover_control.description: The control that will be used for the background when hovered.

backup_font_type.title: Backup Font Type
backup_font_type.description: The type of the backup font.

button_mappings.title: Button Mappings
button_mappings.description: The button mappings that are contained within this element.

checked_control.title: Checked Control
checked_control.description: The control that will be checked.

checked_hover_control.title: Checked Hover Control
checked_hover_control.description: The control that will be checked when hovered.

checked_locked_control.title: Checked Locked Control
checked_locked_control.description: The control that will be checked when locked.

checked_locked_hover_control.title: Checked Locked Hover Control
checked_locked_hover_control.description: The control that will be checked when locked and hovered.

clips_children.title: Clips Children
clips_children.description: If true, the element will clip its children.

clip_direction.title: Clip Direction
clip_direction.description: The direction that the element will be clipped in.

clip_pixelperfect.title: Clip Pixel Perfect
clip_pixelperfect.description: If true, the element will be clipped pixel perfect.

close_on_player_hurt.title: Close On Player Hurt
close_on_player_hurt.description: If true, the element will close when the player is hurt.

collection_name.title: Collection Name
collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the element is in.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the text. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

contained.title: Contained
contained.description: If true, the element will be contained.

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: The controls that are contained within this element.

consume_hover_events.title: Consume Hover Events
consume_hover_events.description: If true, the element will consume hover events.

default_control.title: Default Control
default_control.description: The default control that will be focused.

default_focus_precedence.title: Default Focus Precedence
default_focus_precedence.description: The default focus precedence of the element.

disable_anim_fast_forward.title: Disable Anim Fast Forward
disable_anim_fast_forward.description: If true, the animation will not be fast forwarded.

draggable.title: Draggable
draggable.description: If true, the element will be draggable.

dropdown_area.title: Dropdown Area
dropdown_area.description: The area that the dropdown will be in.

dropdown_content_control.title: Dropdown Content Control
dropdown_content_control.description: The control that will be used for the dropdown content.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: If true, the element will be enabled.

enabled_newline.title: Enabled Newline
enabled_newline.description: If true, the element will be enabled when a new line is created.

enable_directional_toggling.title: Enable Directional Toggling
enable_directional_toggling.description: If true, the element will enable directional toggling.

enable_profanity_filter.title: Enable Profanity Filter
enable_profanity_filter.description: If true, the element will enable the profanity filter.

factory.title: Factory
factory.description: The factory that will be used to create the element.

control_name.title: Control Name
control_name.description: The name of the control that will be created by the factory.

factory_variables.title: Factory Variables
factory_variables.description: The variables that will be used by the factory.

fill.title: Fill
fill.description: If true, the element will fill the screen.

focus_enabled.title: Focus Enabled
focus_enabled.description: If true, the element will be focus enabled.

focus_identifier.title: Focus Identifier
focus_identifier.description: The identifier of the element that will be focused.

focus_magnet_enabled.title: Focus Magnet Enabled
focus_magnet_enabled.description: If true, the element will be focus magnet enabled.

focus_wrap_enabled.title: Focus Wrap Enabled
focus_wrap_enabled.description: If true, the element will be focus wrap enabled.

force_render_below.title: Force Render Below
force_render_below.description: If true, the element will be rendered below the screen.

force_texture_reload.title: Force Texture Reload
force_texture_reload.description: If true, the texture will be reloaded.

font_scale_factor.title: Font Scale Factor
font_scale_factor.description: The scale factor of the font.

grid_item_template.title: Grid Item Template
grid_item_template.description: The template that will be used for the grid item.

grid_dimension_binding.title: Grid Dimension Binding
grid_dimension_binding.description: The binding that will be used for the grid dimension.

grid_rescaling_type.title: Grid Rescaling Type
grid_rescaling_type.description: The type of the grid rescaling.

handle_select.title: Handle Select
handle_select.description: If true, the element will handle select.

handle_deselect.title: Handle Deselect
handle_deselect.description: If true, the element will handle deselect.

hover_alpha.title: Hover Alpha
hover_alpha.description: The alpha of the text when hovered.

hover_color.title: Hover Color
hover_color.description: The color of the text when hovered. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

hover_control.title: Hover Control
hover_control.description: The control that will be hovered.

hover_enabled.title: Hover Enabled
hover_enabled.description: If true, the element will be hover enabled.

ignored.title: Ignored
ignored.description: If true, the element will be ignored.

indent_control.title: Indent Control
indent_control.description: The control that will be indented.

inherit_max_sibling_height.title: Inherit Max Sibling Height
inherit_max_sibling_height.description: If true, the element will inherit the maximum height of its siblings.

is_modal.title: Is Modal
is_modal.description: If true, the element will be modal.

is_showing_menu.title: Is Showing Menu
is_showing_menu.description: If true, the element will be showing the menu.

jump_to_bottom_on_update.title: Jump To Bottom On Update
jump_to_bottom_on_update.description: If true, the element will jump to the bottom when updated.

keep_ratio.title: Keep Ratio
keep_ratio.description: If true, the element will keep its ratio.

layer.title: Layer
layer.description: The layer that the element will be rendered in. Higher layers are rendered on top of lower layers.

localize.title: Localize
localize.description: If true, the element will be localized.

locked_alpha.title: Locked Alpha
locked_alpha.description: The alpha of the text when locked.

locked_color.title: Locked Color
locked_color.description: The color of the text when locked. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

locked_control.title: Locked Control
locked_control.description: The control that will be locked.

low_frequency_rendering.title: Low Frequency Rendering
low_frequency_rendering.description: If true, the element will be rendered at a lower frequency.

maximum_grid_items.title: Maximum Grid Items
maximum_grid_items.description: The maximum number of grid items.

max_length.title: Max Length
max_length.description: The maximum length of the text. If the text is longer than this, it will be truncated.

max_size.title: Max Size
max_size.description: The maximum size of the element.

min_size.title: Min Size
min_size.description: The minimum size of the element.

modal.title: Modal
modal.description: If true, the element will be modal.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: The offset of the element from the anchor point. horizontal by vertical.

primary_color.title: Primary Color
primary_color.description: The primary color of the element. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

place_holder_control.title: Place Holder Control
place_holder_control.description: The control that will be used for the place holder.

pressed_alpha.title: Pressed Alpha
pressed_alpha.description: The alpha of the text when pressed.

pressed_color.title: Pressed Color
pressed_color.description: The color of the text when pressed. This can be a hex color code or a color keyword.

pressed_control.title: Pressed Control
pressed_control.description: The control that will be pressed.

prevent_touch_input.title: Prevent Touch Input
prevent_touch_input.description: If true, the element will prevent touch input.

progress_control.title: Progress Control
progress_control.description: The control that will be used for the progress.

progress_hover_control.title: Progress Hover Control
progress_hover_control.description: The control that will be used for the progress when hovered.

property_bag.title: Property Bag
property_bag.description: The property bag that will be used by the element.

radio_toggle_group.title: Radio Toggle Group
radio_toggle_group.description: The radio toggle group that the element is in.

renderer.title: Renderer
renderer.description: The renderer that will be used by the element.

render_game_behind.title: Render Game Behind
render_game_behind.description: If true, the game will be rendered behind the element.

render_only_when_topmost.title: Render Only When Topmost
render_only_when_topmost.description: If true, the element will only be rendered when it is the topmost element.

reset_event.title: Reset Event
reset_event.description: The event that will be reset.

reset_on_focus_lost.title: Reset On Focus Lost
reset_on_focus_lost.description: If true, the element will be reset when focus is lost.

rotate_speed.title: Rotate Speed
rotate_speed.description: The speed that the element will rotate at.

screen_draws_last.title: Screen Draws Last
screen_draws_last.description: If true, the screen will be drawn last.

screen_not_flushable.title: Screen Not Flushable
screen_not_flushable.description: If true, the screen will not be flushed when the element is added.

send_telemetry.title: Send Telemetry
send_telemetry.description: If true, the element will send telemetry.

shadow.title: Shadow
shadow.description: If true, the text will have a shadow.

should_steal_mouse.title: Should Steal Mouse
should_steal_mouse.description: If true, the element will steal the mouse.

slider_box_control.title: Slider Box Control
slider_box_control.description: The control that will be used for the slider box.

slider_collection_name.title: Slider Collection Name
slider_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the slider is in.

slider_select_on_hover.title: Slider Select On Hover
slider_select_on_hover.description: If true, the slider will select on hover.

slider_small_decrease_button.title: Slider Small Decrease Button
slider_small_decrease_button.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

slider_small_increase_button.title: Slider Small Increase Button
slider_small_increase_button.description: The button that will be used for the slider small decrease.

slider_selected_button.title: Slider Selected Button
slider_selected_button.description: The button that will be used for the slider selected.

slider_deselected_button.title: Slider Deselected Button
slider_deselected_button.description: The button that will be used for the slider deselected.

slider_track_button.title: Slider Track Button
slider_track_button.description: The button that will be used for the slider track.

scroll_box_and_track_panel.title: Scroll Box And Track Panel
scroll_box_and_track_panel.description: The panel that will be used for the scroll box and track.

scroll_content.title: Scroll Content
scroll_content.description: The content that will be scrolled.

scroll_speed.title: Scroll Speed
scroll_speed.description: The speed that the element will scroll at.

scroll_view_port.title: Scroll View Port
scroll_view_port.description: The view port that the element will be scrolled in.

scrollbar_track_button.title: Scrollbar Track Button
scrollbar_track_button.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar track.

scrollbar_touch_button.title: Scrollbar Touch Button
scrollbar_touch_button.description: The button that will be used for the scrollbar touch.

text_box_name.title: Text Box Name
text_box_name.description: The name of the text box.

text_control.title: Text Control
text_control.description: The control that will be used for the text.

text_edit_box_grid_collection_name.title: Text Edit Box Grid Collection Name
text_edit_box_grid_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the text edit box grid is in.

texture_file_system.title: Texture File System
texture_file_system.description: The file system that the texture is in.

tiled.title: Tiled
tiled.description: If true, the texture will be tiled.

toggle_grid_collection_name.title: Toggle Grid Collection Name
toggle_grid_collection_name.description: The name of the collection that the toggle grid is in.

toggle_group_default_selected.title: Toggle Group Default Selected
toggle_group_default_selected.description: The default selected toggle of the toggle group.

toggle_default_state.title: Toggle Default State
toggle_default_state.description: The default state of the toggle.

toggle_group_forced_index.title: Toggle Group Forced Index
toggle_group_forced_index.description: The forced index of the toggle group.

toggle_on_button.title: Toggle On Button
toggle_on_button.description: The button that will toggle the element.

toggle_off_button.title: Toggle Off Button
toggle_off_button.description: The button that will toggle the element.

touch_mode.title: Touch Mode
touch_mode.description: The touch mode of the element.

tts_control_header.title: TTS Control Header
tts_control_header.description: The header of the TTS control.

tts_control_type_order_priority.title: TTS Control Type Order Priority
tts_control_type_order_priority.description: The priority of the TTS control type order.

tts_ignore_subsections.title: TTS Ignore Subsections
tts_ignore_subsections.description: If true, the element will ignore subsections.

tts_index_priority.title: TTS Index Priority
tts_index_priority.description: The priority of the TTS index.

tts_inherit_siblings.title: TTS Inherit Siblings
tts_inherit_siblings.description: If true, the element will inherit its siblings.

tts_toggle_on.title: TTS Toggle On
tts_toggle_on.description: If true, the TTS will toggle on.

tts_toggle_off.title: TTS Toggle Off
tts_toggle_off.description: If true, the TTS will toggle off.

tts_override_control_value.title: TTS Override Control Value
tts_override_control_value.description: If true, the TTS will override the control value.

tts_section_header.title: TTS Section Header
tts_section_header.description: The header of the TTS section.

tts_value_changed.title: TTS Value Changed
tts_value_changed.description: If true, the TTS value will change.

tts_value_order_priority.title: TTS Value Order Priority
tts_value_order_priority.description: The priority of the TTS value order.

unchecked_control.title: Unchecked Control
unchecked_control.description: The control that will be unchecked.

unchecked_hover_control.title: Unchecked Hover Control
unchecked_hover_control.description: The control that will be unchecked when hovered.

unchecked_locked_control.title: Unchecked Locked Control
unchecked_locked_control.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked.

unchecked_locked_hover_control.title: Unchecked Locked Hover Control
unchecked_locked_hover_control.description: The control that will be unchecked when locked and hovered.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: The variables that are contained within this element.

visible.title: Visible
visible.description: If true, the element will be visible.

virtual_keyboard_buffer_control.title: Virtual Keyboard Buffer Control
virtual_keyboard_buffer_control.description: The control that will be used for the virtual keyboard buffer.

zip_folder.title: Zip Folder
zip_folder.description: The folder that the element will be zipped into.

animation.title: Animation
animation.description: An animation is a set of keyframes that can be applied to an element.

animation_reset_name.title: Animation Reset Name
animation_reset_name.description: The name of the animation that will be reset.

destroy_at_end.title: Destroy At End
destroy_at_end.description: If true, the element will be destroyed at the end of the animation.

disable_anim_fast_forward.title: Disable Anim Fast Forward
disable_anim_fast_forward.description: If true, the animation will not be fast forwarded.

end_event.title: End Event
end_event.description: The event that will be triggered when the animation ends.

frame_count.title: Frame Count
frame_count.description: The number of frames in the animation.

from.title: From
from.description: The starting point of the animation.

initial_uv.title: Initial UV
initial_uv.description: The initial UV of the animation.

next.title: Next
next.description: The name of the next element.

play_event.title: Play Event
play_event.description: The event that will be played.

propagate_alpha.title: Propagate Alpha
propagate_alpha.description: If true, the alpha will be propagated.

reversible.title: Reversible
reversible.description: If true, the animation will be reversible.

scale_from_starting_alpha.title: Scale From Starting Alpha
scale_from_starting_alpha.description: If true, the animation will scale from the starting alpha.

to.title: To
to.description: The ending point of the animation.

anyOf.title: Item reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an item: using the following syntax: [element_name]@[namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Item reference
anyOf.description: A reference to an item: using the following syntax: [namespace_reference].[element_name_reference]

anyOf.title: Variable reference
anyOf.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.

C.title: Anchor
C.description: An anchor is a reference to an element in the UI.

D.description: A variable is a reference to a value that can be used in the UI.
